title: Champ Select Freeze?
body: So I queued for ranked and we got into champ select, its my turn to pick and the game froze. The countdown for the enemy team to pick their champ stops at 0 and then I had the connection error. I couldn't pick my champ got a queue dodge timer and lost LP. Any way riot could refund my LP as this is the second time this has happened and I guarantee its not any hardware/software.

replies.body: This freezing during champion select can be a result of connection issues cutting out or losing sync.  We aren't able to alter game stats or alter points, but I do suggest running through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix it up.  That should help prevent further issues from happening, though, test it in a custom to be sure.  Let me know if you have any questions!

hi,

Many players have reported this issue without getting answer so first thanks for providing one at least. 

I have tested all the suggested solutions in the connection issue and nothing changes de problem.

Btw i have noticed that everything works fine in blind mode or in custom. The issue occurs only in draft mode or ranked.
I have completely stopped trying to play in ranked i already lost enough lp and i try a draft sometimes after updates but 3 games on 4 fails.

this started with patch 7.4 but became dramatical with the 7.5. I suspect some google chrome script to be causing this.

Sorry to hear the guide wasn't able to help.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can have a closer look with your case individually.  Grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to obtain some logs.  Attach them to your ticket to give the tech team more context.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
